headline: Datadog (DDOG) Valuation Check After a 24% One-Month Share Price Slide
summary: Datadog (DDOG) has been under quiet pressure lately, with the stock sliding about 24% over the past month despite solid double digit revenue and earnings growth, inviting a closer look at valuation. See our latest analysis for Datadog. That recent 30 day share price return of negative 24.3 percent has flipped Datadog’s short term momentum, even though the 3 year total shareholder return of 84.3 percent still reflects substantial long term confidence in its growth story. If Datadog’s pullback...
